targets.expr: sum (100 * (1 - (sum(node_memory_MemFree_bytes + node_memory_Buffers_bytes + node_memory_Cached_bytes) by (instance) / sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes) by (instance)))) / count(node_memory_MemFree_bytes * 100)
